entries.name: Robert Scoble
entries.notes: San Francisco/Silicon Valley AI thought leader. Covers robots, holodecks, BCIs, analysis of new tech. Ex-Microsoft, Rackspace, Fast Company. Wrote 8 books about the future. Tech influencer with large following. Follows Liam - warm lead.
